That is really great news... Im very pleased to=
 see this concept taking form. I have been disappointed with the articles o=
n wikipedia in the past. I did contribute an article once, but in general I=
 didnt feel it was worth it. 

I would definately be willing to add some of=
 my seppuku research when my thesis is complete, if that is something of in=
terest.

jonathan ellgen
